title: Consider Displaying URL/Location/Context to User in UWP Application During Authentication
body: (Administrator: I am listing this one as a bug, because I consider it a existing security issue that can be exploited at present, but please feel free to categorize it however you see fit, as always!)

comments.body:
This needs to be addressed. People are getting more and more scared of entering their login details. It needs to be crystal clear to the user where they are entering the information.
WebAuthenticationBroker is great for developers, now it just needs to be made clear to the user that it's safe to use.
